// Output signature:
//
// Name                 Index   Mask Register SysValue  Format   Used
// -------------------- ----- ------ -------- -------- ------- ------
// SV_Target                0   xyzw        0   TARGET   float   xyzw
//
ps_5_0
dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_constantbuffer cb0[2], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb1[54], immediateIndexed
dcl_sampler s0, mode_default
dcl_sampler s1, mode_default
dcl_sampler s2, mode_default
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t0
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t1
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t2
dcl_input_ps linear noperspective v0.xy
dcl_output o0.xyzw
dcl_temps 7
dcl_resource_structured t101, 864

// cb1 remapped to t101 with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --remap-cb 1 101 -i -f --only-autofixed --disable-driver-stereo-cb 12 6aedd7e995d08f56-ps.txt
ld_structured_indexable(structured_buffer, stride=864)(mixed,mixed,mixed,mixed) r6.xyzw, l(0), l(848), t101.xyzw

mad r0.xyzw, cb0[1].zwzw, l(-0.500000, 0.500000, 0.500000, 0.500000), v0.xyxy
sample_l_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r1.x, r0.xyxx, t0.wxyz, s0, l(0.000000)
mul r1.x, r1.x, l(255.000000)
round_ne r1.x, r1.x
ftou r1.x, r1.x
and r1.x, r1.x, l(15)
ieq r1.x, r1.x, l(5)
mov r2.w, l(1.000000)
sample_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r3.xyzw, r0.xyxx, t2.xyzw, s1
dp3 r0.x, r3.xyzx, l(0.300000, 0.590000, 0.110000, 0.000000)
div_sat r0.x, r3.w, r0.x
mul r2.xyz, r0.xxxx, r3.xyzx
and r1.xyzw, r1.xxxx, r2.xyzw
mov r2.x, r1.w
sample_l_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r0.x, r0.zwzz, t0.wxyz, s0, l(0.000000)
sample_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r3.xyzw, r0.zwzz, t2.xyzw, s1
mul r0.x, r0.x, l(255.000000)
round_ne r0.x, r0.x
ftou r0.x, r0.x
and r0.x, r0.x, l(15)
ieq r0.x, r0.x, l(5)
dp3 r0.y, r3.xyzx, l(0.300000, 0.590000, 0.110000, 0.000000)
div_sat r0.y, r3.w, r0.y
mul r3.xyz, r0.yyyy, r3.xyzx
mov r3.w, l(1.000000)
and r0.xyzw, r0.xxxx, r3.xyzw
mov r2.y, r0.w
add r0.xyzw, r0.xyzw, r1.xyzw
mad r1.xyzw, cb0[1].zwzw, l(0.500000, -0.500000, -0.500000, -0.500000), v0.xyxy
sample_l_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r3.x, r1.xyxx, t0.wxyz, s0, l(0.000000)
mul r3.x, r3.x, l(255.000000)
round_ne r3.x, r3.x
ftou r3.x, r3.x
and r3.x, r3.x, l(15)
ieq r3.x, r3.x, l(5)
mov r4.w, l(1.000000)
sample_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r5.xyzw, r1.xyxx, t2.xyzw, s1
dp3 r1.x, r5.xyzx, l(0.300000, 0.590000, 0.110000, 0.000000)
div_sat r1.x, r5.w, r1.x
mul r4.xyz, r1.xxxx, r5.xyzx
and r3.xyzw, r3.xxxx, r4.xyzw
mov r2.z, r3.w
sample_l_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r1.x, r1.zwzz, t0.wxyz, s0, l(0.000000)
sample_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r4.xyzw, r1.zwzz, t2.xyzw, s1
mul r1.x, r1.x, l(255.000000)
round_ne r1.x, r1.x
ftou r1.x, r1.x
and r1.x, r1.x, l(15)
ieq r1.x, r1.x, l(5)
dp3 r1.y, r4.xyzx, l(0.300000, 0.590000, 0.110000, 0.000000)
div_sat r1.y, r4.w, r1.y
mul r4.xyz, r1.yyyy, r4.xyzx
mov r4.w, l(1.000000)
and r1.xyzw, r1.xxxx, r4.xyzw
mov r2.w, r1.w
add r1.xyzw, r1.xyzw, r3.xyzw
add r0.xyzw, r0.xyzw, r1.xyzw
gather4_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r1.xyzw, v0.xyxx, t1.xyzw, s2.x
mad r3.xy, r1.xyxx, r6.zzzz, -r6.wwww
div r3.xy, l(1.000000, 1.000000, 1.000000, 1.000000), r3.xyxx
mad r1.xy, r1.xyxx, r6.xxxx, r6.yyyy
add r3.xy, r3.xyxx, r1.xyxx
mad r1.xy, r1.zwzz, r6.zzzz, -r6.wwww
mad r1.zw, r1.zzzw, r6.xxxx, r6.yyyy
div r1.xy, l(1.000000, 1.000000, 1.000000, 1.000000), r1.xyxx
add r3.zw, r1.xxxy, r1.zzzw
dp4 r1.x, r3.xyzw, r2.xyzw
max r0.w, r0.w, l(0.000010)
div r0.w, l(1.000000, 1.000000, 1.000000, 1.000000), r0.w
mul o0.w, r0.w, r1.x
mul o0.xyz, r0.wwww, r0.xyzx
ret 
// Approximately 0 instruction slots used
